com.bizosys.hsearch.query
Class DocWeight

java.lang.Object
  com.bizosys.hsearch.query.DocWeight

public class DocWeight
extends java.lang.Object

Overall Term weights for a document. Top ranked term weighted documents enter for meta fetching and further refined meta and teaser ranking process.

karan
